text: @Mike_Pence @VP @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse You know that's not true. Trump dragged his ass two months, ignored warnings, called Coronavirus a media/Dem hoax. If he actually took it seriously maybe just maybe we would have enough supplies and would be in a better position right now.
